title: The History of Altruism
description: This book analyzes Human Sacrifice and its modern form Altruism providing new insight into the most deadly and evil idea ever propagated upon mankind. The book argues clearly that altruism is the cause of most man-made catastrophes and results in harm to the individual and destruction of civil society.The book also argues that the best way forward for man is to reject the concepts of altruism and collectivism and replace them with individualism and individual rights.
author: Robert   Villegas
